summary: CKPE is a text editor to work efficiently on scripting Papyrus Skyrim. This is particularly better integrated tools such as NotePad++ or Sublime Text 2 offers many features related to the management scripts Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Got tired of NotePad++? UltraEdit Sublime Text 2 and do not convinced? You are allergic to Emacs? So CKPE is surely for you! CKPE is a text editor to work efficiently on scripting Papyrus Skyrim. This is particularly better integrated tools such as NotePad++ or Sublime Text 2 offers many features related to the management scripts Skyrim.

Here is a list of all the features included in CKPE:[list]
[*]Multi-tab window, with floating capabilities (à-la Visual Studio, Eclispe, ...)
[*]100% customizable interface
[*]Syntax Highlighting
[*]Autocompletion
[*]Code Folding
[*]Script compilation support
[*]Script Browser with fast search
[*]Help and code assistant
[*]Some basic code pre-analysis before compilation
[*]Themable interface
[*]SKSE should be support
[/list]

Moreover, CKPE is available in four languages : English, French, German and Japanese. Your language is not here ? Just PM me !

This tool is developed and maintained by the French communities \"Wiwiland\" and \"La Confrérie des Traducteurs\".

YOU\'RE NOT ALLOWED TO (RE) ISSUE WITHOUT MENTIONING ITS AUTHOR (Lucead / Daimakaicho). YOU ARE NOT AUTHORIZED TO MODIFY, ALTER, DIVERT OR HACK TOOL WITHOUT MY PERMISSION.
author: Lucead
